name: Sentinum
description: The glass fiber reinforced housing with IP67 protection class makes the Apollon-Q level sensor from Sentinum a high quality product. Applicable for level measurement of containers, shafts, channels or even in small containers like waste baskets, the sensor provides reliable data with a measurement from 2cm up to 250cm. Even inhomogeneous surfaces are recorded very well due to many small measuring points.
author: Akenza AG
